Articles.Content:
Well if the APC is too heavy for ya, you might wanna try this little guy out...

http://i1377.photobucket.com/albums/ah65/CorperalVasquez/screenshot261_zps936edf75.png' alt='screenshot261_zps936edf75.png'>

The M223 Rapid Assault Transporter. Aptly named cause its FAST, and it makes a great Dune Hopper on off world planets!
